description:
The Test without config drive is exactly the same as the one with config drive so this is not being tested

Without config drive: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/api/openstack/compute/test_servers.py#L2775
with config drive: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/api/openstack/compute/test_servers.py#L2695


I believe that to fix it I just need to remove the line that specifies the config drive leaving the extension activated.
title: Unit Test to create instance without config driver is wrong

comments.content:
The Test without config drive is exactly the same as the one with config drive so this is not being tested

Without config drive: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/api/openstack/compute/test_servers.py#L2775
with config drive: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/tests/api/openstack/compute/test_servers.py#L2695


I believe that to fix it I just need to remove the line that specifies the config drive leaving the extension activated.
